statements: UPDATE customer_feedback SET customer_name = 'Alice', feedback_text = 'Great service!', rating = 5 WHERE feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE customer_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Poor experience', rating = 2, customer_name = 'Bob' WHERE feedback_id = 2;
UPDATE customer_feedback SET rating = 5, feedback_text = 'Excellent service' WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe' AND feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE customer_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Average experience', rating = 3 WHERE feedback_id = 2;
UPDATE feedback SET rating = 5 WHERE feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE review SET review_text = 'Great product, highly recommended!' WHERE review_id = 2;
UPDATE feedback SET rating = 5, feedback_text = 'Excellent service' WHERE feedback_id = 1;
UPDATE review SET review_date = '2022-09-15', review_text = 'Great product, highly recommend' WHERE product_id = 101 AND customer_id = 201;
UPDATE customer_feedback SET rating = 4, feedback = 'Great experience' WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE product_reviews SET rating = 5, review_text = 'Excellent product quality' WHERE review_id = 201;

UPDATE products SET price = 29.99, category = 'Electronics' WHERE product_id = 5;

UPDATE products SET price = 15.99, category = 'Electronics' WHERE product_id = 3;
UPDATE Customer SET customer_name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE Product SET price = 29.99, description = 'New and improved version' WHERE product_id = 5;
